metadata.title: CVE-2021-47181 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: usb:musb: tusb6010: check return value after calling platform_get_resource() Itwill cause null-ptr-deref if platform_get_resource() returns NULL, we needcheck the return value.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-47181` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.15.0-167-generic - 4.15.0-167.175
linux-image-4.15.0-167-generic-lpae - 4.15.0-167.175
linux-image-4.15.0-167-lowlatency - 4.15.0-167.175
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-167-generic - 4.15.0-167.175
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-167-lowlatency - 4.15.0-167.175
No subscription required

linux-image-5.4.0-97-generic - 5.4.0-97.110~18.04.1
linux-image-5.4.0-97-generic-lpae - 5.4.0-97.110~18.04.1
linux-image-5.4.0-97-lowlatency - 5.4.0-97.110~18.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-97-generic - 5.4.0-97.110~18.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-97-lowlatency - 5.4.0-97.110~18.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-4.15.0-1106-kvm - 4.15.0-1106.108
No subscription required

No subscription required

No subscription required

No subscription required

No subscription required

No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1063-gcp - 5.4.0-1063.67~18.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1014-ibm - 5.4.0-1014.15~18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-167.175').
linux-hwe: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'replaced by linux-hwe-5.4').
linux-hwe-5.4 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.4.0-97.110~18.04.1').
